My recommendations after playing this game more than 400 hours:
1. Buy prime.
2. Now that you have prime do not do the mistake to solo queue on competitive matchmaking.
3. If you are trying to build a team make sure that you don't include Vasilache in it.
4. After 200-700 hours you'll figure out that this game sucks and fucking uninstall this game.
You never get bored playing this game
